enhanced_by.reason: loanAdjustLTV requires an existing loan order to adjust its LTV, which is typically created by loanBorrow.
loanAdjustLTV may need to check ongoing loan orders to ensure the order exists before adjusting its LTV.
loanAdjustLTVHistory can be used to verify the LTV adjustment was recorded correctly.
loanOngoingOrders can be used to verify the LTV adjustment is reflected in the ongoing orders.
